codegen - package codegen
 
Codegen - Class in codegen
The Codegen class will walk the AST, determine and set variable offsets and generate the bytecodes
Codegen(AST) - Constructor for class codegen.Codegen
Create a new code generator based on the given AST
Codes - Class in codegen
Class Codes maintains bytecode related information: 1.

compiler - package compiler
 
Compiler - Class in compiler
The Compiler class contains the main program for compiling a source program to bytecodes
Compiler(String) - Constructor for class compiler.Compiler
 
constrain - package constrain
 
Constrainer - Class in constrain
Constrainer object will visit the AST, gather/check variable type information and decorate uses of variables with their declarations; the decorations will be used by the code generator to provide access to the frame offset of the variable for generating load/store bytecodes;
Note that when constraining expression trees we return the type tree corresponding to the result type of the expression; e.g.
Constrainer(AST, Parser) - Constructor for class constrain.Constrainer
 
Constrainer.ConstrainerErrors - Enum in constrain
